```{r}

#Reading the data and organizing the data
data <- read.csv("activity.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(lattice)
#calculating the total and mean steps
dailysteps <- aggregate(steps ~ date, data = data, sum, na.rm = T)
head(dailysteps)
```
